title: Why fastDOOM is fast
dot: digraph fastDOOM{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded];"NeXTStep DOOM"->"Linux DOOM";"Linux DOOM"->"Heretic";"Linux DOOM"->"PCDOOM v2";"Heretic"->"PCDOOM v2";"PCDOOM v2"->"fastDOOM";subgraph cluster_optimizations{label="fastDOOM Optimizations";style=filled;color=lightblue;"fastDOOM"->"v0.1"[label="220 commits"];"fastDOOM"->"v0.6"[label="33 commits"];"fastDOOM"->"v0.8"[label="282 commits"];"fastDOOM"->"v0.9.2"[label="110 commits"];"fastDOOM"->"v0.9.7"[label="294 commits"];}subgraph cluster_performance_improvements{label="Key Performance Improvements";style=filled;color=lightgrey;"v0.1"->"Crispy Optimization"[label="2 fps boost"];"v0.1"->"Inline FixedDiv"[label="Speed gain"];"v0.6"->"Skip Unneeded Visplanes"[label="MVP"];"v0.8"->"One Executable per Renderer"[label="Optimization"];"v0.9.2"->"Optimize Skyflatnum Comparison"[label="Speed gain"];"v0.9.7"->"x86 ASM Changes"[label="Performance boost"];}subgraph cluster_modes{label="Video Modes";style=filled;color=lightgreen;"Mode 13h"[label="Mode 13h\nLinear framebuffer"];"Mode Y"[label="Mode Y\nTriple-buffering in VRAM"];"fastDOOM"->"Mode 13h"[label="Optimized for fast CPUs"];"fastDOOM"->"Mode Y"[label="Optimized for slow CPUs"];}subgraph cluster_contributors{label="Contributors";style=filled;color=pink;"Victor Nieto (Viti95)"->"fastDOOM"[label="Main developer"];"Ken Silverman"->"fastDOOM"[label="Rendering optimizations"];"John Carmack"->"DOOM"[label="Original creator"];}"fastDOOM"->"References"[label="Detailed analysis"];}
